channel.title: New To RSPS's
channel.description:
Hello Guys,
I've been playing Runescape for almost 9 years and recently started RSPS's as to be honest they're more enjoyable. I've been offered a position to run a private server with a friend but I have literally no experience at all, so I was wondering how long does it take on average to learn java programming; To be able to learn brief knowledge such as how to add shops, NPC's, Fix bugs/glitches and so on.
I'd also like some advice/help from users who have ran their own RSPS on what documents is best for me to read time and any other tips which are useful.
Regards - Deci

item.title: New To RSPS's
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’m more of a website developer, but I’ve started learning Java recently. I suggest using this. Just follow all of the tutorials and do what it tells you to do, by the end of that, you’ll have a great knowledge and understanding of Java, not just in Private Servers, but Java in general.

Read full topic

item.title: New To RSPS's
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

By just trying trying and trying, putting hours into it

Read full topic
